Name: Evelyn Carolina Mora Rivera
Description:
Evelyn was found dead with a cut to the neck in the room she was renting in Surco.

The police indicated that the deceased was stabbed on the second floor of the building, and had managed to walk to the garden where she fell and bled to death.

In May 2015 Giner Leandro Pozo, 22, was arrested on Avenida Aviación in San Borja and confessed to her murder.

According to her neighbours, Evelyn was a stylist who had only arrived from Colombia a month earlier.

TvT partner organization: Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans
